result.name: yjmis
result.notes: Case level data from the Youth Offending Teamss in England and Wales. Collected on a quaterly basis this includes a range of information relating to convicted young people, their offence(s), victim(s), court appearances, disposal, intervention programmes and contacts with the YOT. Some of this data is deemed personal.Data can be produced at a regional/national level.

organization.name: ministry-of-justice
organization.title: Ministry of Justice
organization.description:
We work to protect the public and reduce reoffending, and to provide a more effective, transparent and responsive criminal justice system for victims and the public.

MOJ is a ministerial department, supported by 37 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-justice

result.title: Youth offending case management data

extras.value: The following statistical publications are made using data from this source: Youth Justice Statistics.
